directions: [["Preheat oven to 350Â°. Saute roux base ingredients in a large pan for 5 to 6 minutes, or until tender."],["Add roux finish ingredients starting with the flour, stirring constantly, for 1 minute."],["Add remaining roux finish ingredients, reduce heat to medium and cook, stirring constantly, for 6 to 8 minutes or until thickened and bubbly."],["Remove from heat; add hotdish ingredients, stirring until cheese melts.
